content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=0-4, y=0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at position(0,0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2,0)
Both furnaces process iron ore into iron plates

###Copper Plate Production Area (Position x=4, y=4)
Single stone furnace that processes copper ore into copper plates

###Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Complex production line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) connecting input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at position(12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

###Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-28.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water at positions(-9.5,23.5),(-8.5,23.5),(-8.5,22.5),(-7.5,22.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam pipe at position(-5.5, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Electric pole network connecting power to other structures

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing lab
- Cannot place lab at position(0.5, 28.5) or (0.5, 30.5) due to:
  - Something blocking the target location
  - Terrain being unplaceable (water)
- Ensure target location is clear and on valid terrain before placing lab

### Errors when accessing lab entity
- Getting lab entity at position(0.5, 28.5) fails
- Ensure lab is properly placed before trying to access it
- Verify lab position coordinates are correct

### Resource shortages
- Electronic circuit production halts due to missing:
  - Iron plates (1 needed)
  - Copper cables (3 needed)
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials to production lines

### Furnace operation issues
- Furnaces frequently show NO_INGREDIENTS status
- Maintain regular supply of both fuel (coal) and ore to keep furnaces operational
